title: Blondy the Astronaut
backCoverBlurb: Blondy is going to the moon! Join her on a sparkly journey through space, with a shiny rocket ship, bright stars, and a very special discovery.
characterDescription: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. She has a wide, happy and energetic smile. She is wearing a silver space suit with a red star.

pages.text: Blondy looked up at the moon. It was big and white. I want to go there! she said. Can you reach for a star?
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is wearing a silver space suit and is reaching her arm up towards a crescent moon in the night sky.

pages.text: She put on her silver space suit. Click! went the buckles. Now I am a space explorer!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is smiling as she fastens the silver buckles of her astronaut suit. Her helmet is sitting nearby.

pages.text: 3... 2... 1... BLAST OFF! The rocket went up, up, up into the deep blue sky. Whoosh!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is seen inside the cockpit of a rocket ship, looking out at the sky turning from blue to black.

pages.text: Everything in the rocket started to float. Even Blondy! She felt light and bouncy like a balloon.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is floating in the air inside her rocket ship, looking surprised and very happy.

pages.text: She saw the Earth behind her. It was a beautiful blue ball. Can you point to the blue?
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is looking out a round window at the beautiful blue and white Earth floating in dark space.

pages.text: The rocket landed on the moon with a soft thud. There was grey dust everywhere. Pffft!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is stepping out onto the grey, cratered surface of the moon, looking around in wonder.

pages.text: Blondy jumped very high. Boing, boing! The moon felt soft and quiet under her boots.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is taking a giant leap on the moon, her red star on her suit shining in the sunlight.

pages.text: She found a shiny moon-stone. It was smooth and cold. Rub your hands together to stay warm!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is holding a glowing, smooth moon rock in her hands and looking at it with wide eyes.

pages.text: The stars were like tiny, twinkly lights. Everything was so magical and vast.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is sitting on a moon rock, looking at a sky full of billions of twinkling, colorful stars.

pages.text: It was time to fly back home. The rocket zoomed through the stars. Zoom, zoom, zoom!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is back in her rocket, steering it with a focused and empowered expression.

pages.text: The rocket landed safely in Blondy's garden. She took off her helmet. Fresh air! Ahhh.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is standing in her green garden at night, holding her astronaut helmet and smiling.

pages.text: Goodnight, space girl. You had a big adventure today. Sleep tight with the stars above.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. A peaceful close-up of Blondy sleeping in her bed with a starry nightlight glowing nearby.
